QuestData.Title: Dreamweaver
QuestData.Description:
Troubled winds sweep across Tirna Vaal. The boughs tremble in concern over the Queen's arrival. All must be as it should be.
Dreamweaver's wings droop with the weight of worry. Chaos swirls around the wildseeds under his care.
Calm the churning waters of the grove. Bring harmony to discord and let Dreamweaver flutter once more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Dreamweaver in the Tranquil Pools.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Dreamweaver in the Tranquil Pools.
QuestData.RewardText:
You're new, aren't you? Not a fae, not a soul, nor are you bound for a wildseed.
And the droman sent you here to help me? Well, this just got very interesting.
